DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare in patients with critical limb ischemia the efficacy of angioplasty with different paclitaxel-eluting balloon devices for below-the-knee lesions in terms of restenosis.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Eluting Balloon in peripherAl inTErvention for Below-The-Knee Arteries With Freeway and Lutonix
DOC.detailed_description: Two devices will be evaluated: the Lutonix and the Freeway paclitaxel eluting balloons. A post-hoc analysis will compare the results with the historical data from DEBATE-BTK (NCT01558505).
DOC.criteria: age>18 years angiographic stenosis>50% or occlusion of one belowknee vessel allergy to Paclitaxel contraindication for combined antiplatelet treatment life expectancy <1 year hypersensitivity or contraindication to one of the study drugs lack of consent need for amputation
